docs.title: Ankush Chander
docs.text:
I am PhD student at Dhirubhai Ambani University and KDM Lab fellow. My interests lie in natural lanuage processing in scholarly articles. I am also interested in LLM evaluation and model investigation. I am currently working on Hypothesis Generation Evaluation.

Email: ankush_chander@dau.ac.in ankush.watchtower@gmail.com

Phone: +91 7968261581
